1.text: And in the seventh month, on the first day of the month, ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work: it is a day of blowing the trumpets to you.

2.text: And ye shall offer a burnt-offering for a sweet savor to the LORD; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year without blemish:

3.text: And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts for a bullock, and two tenth-parts for a ram,

4.text: And one tenth-part for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

5.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering, to make an atonement for you:

6.text: Besides the burnt-offering of the month, and his meat-offering, and the daily burnt-offering, and his meat-offering, and their drink-offerings, according to their manner, for a sweet savor, a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.

7.text: And ye shall have on the tenth day of this seventh month a holy convocation; and ye shall afflict your souls: in it ye shall not do any work.

8.text: But ye shall offer a burnt-offering to the LORD for a sweet savor; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year; they shall be to you without blemish:

9.text: And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts to a bullock, and two tenth-parts to one ram,

10.text: A several tenth-part for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

11.text: One kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the sin-offering of atonement, and the continual burnt-offering, and the meat-offering of it, and their drink-offerings.

12.text: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work, and ye shall keep a feast to the LORD seven days:

13.text: And ye shall offer a burnt-offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD; thirteen young bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year; they shall be without blemish:

14.text: And their meat-offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth-parts to every bullock of the thirteen bullocks, two tenth-parts to each ram of the two rams,

15.text: And a several tenth-part to each lamb of the fourteen lambs:

16.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, his meat-offering, and his drink-offering.

17.text: And on the second day ye shall offer twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:

18.text: And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

19.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and their drink-offerings.

20.text: And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish;

21.text: And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

22.text: And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.

23.text: And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

24.text: Their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner.

25.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.

26.text: And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:

27.text: And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

28.text: And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.

29.text: And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

30.text: And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

31.text: And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.

32.text: And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

33.text: And their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

34.text: And one goat for a sin-offering: besides the continual burnt-offering, its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.

35.text: On the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: in it ye shall do no servile work.

36.text: But ye shall offer a burnt-offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savor to the LORD: one bullock, one ram, seven lambs of the first year without blemish:

37.text: Their meat-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

38.text: And one goat for a sin-offering; besides the continual burnt-offering, and its meat-offering, and its drink-offering.

39.text: These things ye shall do to the LORD in your set feasts, besides your vows, and your free-will-offerings, for your burnt-offerings, and for your meat-offerings, and for your drink-offerings, and for your peace-offerings.

40.text: And Moses told the children of Israel according to all that the LORD commanded Moses.
